name: Animals vs Animals
description:
Let the race begin!
Welcome to the funnest game you've ever played. Animals vs Animals is waiting for you to do some tricky things. The poor puppy is insulted by the others because he always comes last at the finish line.
Help him to prevent this from happening again. Use his skills like water or fire to prevent others from passing you. Restore the puppy's reputation and he will thank you in turn!

Game features:
  • Multiple levels
  • Animal cars racing
  • Using tricky skills

This game can be quite hard for some players, this is also the goal of this game, not being like others simple ones.
Good Luck!
